threepio.documenter
Class TagExtractor

java.lang.Object
  threepio.helper.RegexHelper
      threepio.documenter.TagExtractor

public class TagExtractor
extends RegexHelper

TagExtractor extracts tags from a String, without modifying the String.

Author:
jhoule

extractTags

public static java.util.ArrayList<XTag> extractTags(java.lang.String str)
                                             throws java.lang.Exception
extractTags (String) returns a list of XTag objects representing the tags found in the String.

Parameters:
str - - the String to list tags from.
Returns:
the list of XTag objects.
Throws:
java.lang.Exception - - when making a tag fails.

                                                         java.lang.String type)

extactTags (String, String) returns a list of XTag objects representing the tags found in the first String which are of a "type" given as the Second String.

Parameters:

extractTypedTags

public static java.util.ArrayList<XTag> extractTypedTags(java.lang.String str,
                                                         java.lang.String type,
                                                         boolean includeClosers)
                                                  throws java.lang.Exception
extractTags (String, String, boolean) returns a list of XTag objects representing the tags found in the first String which are of a "type" given as the second String. The boolean is a control for inclusion of "closing tags."

Parameters:
str - - the String to list tags from.
type - - the type of tag to list.s
includeClosers - - if true, "closing" tags will be included in the list. Otherwise, they will not.
Returns:
teh list of XTag objects of the desired type.
Throws:
java.lang.Exception - - when making a tag fails.

tagListFromStringList

private static java.util.ArrayList<XTag> tagListFromStringList(java.util.List<java.lang.String> strs)
                                                        throws java.lang.Exception
tagListFromStringList is a helper function for tag extraction. The list of Strings representing "tags," is returned as a list of XTag objects.

Parameters:
strs - - the list of Strings to create XTag objects out of.
Returns:
a list of XTag objects representing the items on the list of Strings.
Throws:
java.lang.Exception - - when an item on the String list cannot be turned into a XTag.
